description: This file defines a Flutter widget for the 'Orders Overview' screen used by managers in the app. It includes UI components such as headers and notes, and references theme styles.

classes.name: ManagerOrdersOverviewScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that builds the main orders overview page for managers, including placeholders for summary cards, orders list, and filters.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a decorated header with an icon and title.

classes.name: _Note
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a styled note or placeholder text with an icon.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for each widget, assembling containers, rows, and text with theme styling.
